content.en: Optical image encryption: Researchers are exploring various algorithms to improve the security and capacity of optical image encryption. These algorithms, such as the Modified Gerchberg-Saxton algorithm, phase modulation, cascaded phase retrieval algorithm, and fractional Fourier transform, are being used to reduce cross talks, enhance security, and enable image transformation. By combining different techniques like log-polar transform, double random phase encoding, and phase mask multiplexing, researchers aim to create flexible and efficient multiple-image encryption systems.
content.da: Optisk billedkryptering: Forskere undersøger forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre sikkerheden og kapaciteten af optisk billedkryptering. Disse algoritmer, såsom den modificerede Gerchberg-Saxton-algoritme, fasemodulation, kaskaderet faseindhentningsalgoritme og fraktioneret Fourier-transform, bruges til at reducere krydstale, forbedre sikkerheden og muliggøre billedtransformation. Ved at kombinere forskellige teknikker som log-polar transform, dobbelt tilfældig fasekodning og fasedemaskemultiplexing, sigter forskere mod at skabe fleksible og effektive flerbilledkrypteringssystemer.
